message: Let's split fairly, but I get a little more since the value decreases for me each round.
Your offer was a good starting point, but let's be a bit more equitable considering the decreasing value. This offer accounts for the time sensitivity.
Bob, time is literally money in this game.  Let's settle closer to the middle ground before this drags on.
Alice, I understand your point about time, but fairness is important too. This is my final offer that reflects the time pressure while still striving for a reasonable split.
